title: Mikael Kingsbury on perfecting mogul, spinal injury, and Beijing 2022
description: Olympic champion Mikael Kingsbury is widely regarded as the most accomplished mogul skier in history. The Canadian has perfected the balance between style and speed that has led to a decade of dominance. Ash Tulloch joined Mikael for a chat about his recovery from a fractured vertebra, being recognised in Quebec, and how he mastered mogul skiing ahead of the Winter Olympics in China.
